Name: SaveTests
Text: Interface can be saved using any combinations of the parameters

SortedAscending.Name: SortedAscending
SortedAscending.ConstraintsAsString: OrgLevel1 = Present or OrgLevel2 = Present or OrgLevel3 = Present or OrgLevel4 = Present

SortedDescending.Name: SortedDescending
SortedDescending.ConstraintsAsString: OrgLevel1 = Present or OrgLevel2 = Present or OrgLevel3 = Present or OrgLevel4 = Present

Random.Name: Random
Random.ConstraintsAsString: OrgLevel1 = Present or OrgLevel2 = Present or OrgLevel3 = Present or OrgLevel4 = Present

NoSorting.Name: NoSorting
NoSorting.ConstraintsAsString: OrgLevel1 = Absent and OrgLevel2 = Absent and OrgLevel3 = Absent and OrgLevel4 = Absent

AllParametersSortedAscending.Name: AllParametersSortedAscending
AllParametersSortedAscending.Text: parameters are sorted in ascending order

AllParametersSortedDescending.Name: AllParametersSortedDescending
AllParametersSortedDescending.Text: parameters are sorted in descending order

AllParametersSortedRandomly.Name: AllParametersSortedRandomly
AllParametersSortedRandomly.Text: parameters are sorted in random order

AllParametersArePresent.Name: AllParametersArePresent
AllParametersArePresent.Condition: OrgLevel1 = Present and OrgLevel2 = Present and OrgLevel3 = Present and OrgLevel4 = Present

SomeParametersAreAbsent.Name: SomeParametersAreAbsent
SomeParametersAreAbsent.Text: not all ORG levels 1-4 are present
SomeParametersAreAbsent.Condition: OrgLevel1 = Absent or OrgLevel2 = Absent or OrgLevel3 = Absent or OrgLevel4 = Absent

AllParametersAreAbsent.Name: AllParametersAreAbsent
AllParametersAreAbsent.Condition: OrgLevel1 = Absent and OrgLevel2 = Absent and OrgLevel3 = Absent and OrgLevel4 = Absent
